pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Differentially Variable Genes Using the Mixture of Marginal Distributions // Gene selection based on variance using the marginal distributions of gene profiles that characterized by a mixture of three-component multivariate distributions. Please see the reference: Li X, Fu Y, Wang X, DeMeo DL, Tantisira K, Weiss ST, Qiu W. (2018) doi:10.1155/2018/6591634.
